greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A342004(A276086(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..65537
Index entries for sequences related to primorial base
program: A276086(n) = { my(m=1, p=2); while(n, m *= (p^(n%p)); n = n\p; p = nextprime(1+p)); (m); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 03 2021
